content.question: In the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-plane, how many horizontal or vertical tangent lines does the curve <math alttext="x times y squared, equals, 2 plus x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> have?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
